attributes.action: ensure an appeal is made if baby P's killers are given less than 20 years in prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any child murder is utterly appalling, but the case of the torture and murder of Baby P is particularly harrowing.  The PM must ensure than an appeal is made if the Judge involved in the sentencing of Baby P's killers gives less than 20 years to those found guilty of this appalling crime.

rejection.details: This is a hypothetical case outside the remit of the Prime Minister and should be directed to the Ministry of Justice.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
